page.title: 12VILLAGE HALL CONT.
page.content: THE PLAYGROUP MEETS IN THE HALL TWICE A WEEK IN WINTER,3 TIMES IN SUMMER.THE PRESENT LEADER COMES FROM WOOLAVINGTON SMALL CHILDREN,BETWEEN 3 AND 5 YEARS, ATTEND TO PLAY WITH OTHER CHILDREN AND PREPARE FOR SCHOOL.THEY PLAY WITH SAND AND WATER,DOUGH FOR MODELLING,DRESSING UP CLOTHES,HAVE STORIES AND SING-SONGS AND DANCE.MOTHERS AND TODDLERS ATTEND ONCE A WEEK.A WHIST DRIVE MEETS EVERY TUESDAY EVENING.WHIST IS A CARD GAME PLAYED BETWEEN FOUR PEOPLE.THE YOUTH CLUB MEETS ON A WEDNESDAY EVENING FOR YOUNG PEOPLE UP TO 16 YRS.THEY TAKE PART IN DARTS,SNOOKER AND TABLE TENNIS COMPETITIONS.THE WOMENS'GROUP MEET ONCE A MONTH.THEY HAVE TALKS ON SUBJECTS OF INTEREST,SUCH AS THE DRAINAGE OF THE MOORS,NEEDLEWORK,CIDER AND WINE MAKING,FLOWERS AND GARDENING, EDUCATION.THE SCHOOL ALSO USE THE HALL FOR GYMNASTICS AND DRAMA ONCE A WEEK.
